title: Calories in Sushi
meta_description: Discover calories in sushi per 100g, including carbs, protein, fat, and variations for different types like nigiri or rolls.
assumptions: Average mixed sushi (nigiri and maki rolls) with vinegared rice, raw fish or seafood, nori, and minimal veggies; no dipping sauces or extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (nigiri, rolls, tempura), ingredients, portion size, and preparation; check restaurant info or labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of average sushi provides about 181 kcal, with high carbs from rice and moderate protein from fish.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one piece of sushi?
faqs.a: About 40-60 kcal per piece, depending on type; nigiri is lower than rolls.

faqs.q: What are the macros for calories in sushi?

faqs.a: Yes, sashimi (no rice) has ~100 kcal per 100g; avoid fried or creamy rolls.

faqs.q: How does soy sauce affect calories in sushi?
faqs.a: 1 tbsp adds ~10 kcal and 900mg sodium; use sparingly.

faqs.q: Calories in sushi rolls vs. nigiri?
